reviews.review_content:
This woman is terrible. I strongly recommend never taking a class with her. This is the hardest I’ve ever worked in any class and barely scraped by with a okay grade. She seems like a nice person in class, however when it comes to grading I’ve never dealt with a more unfair teacher. Whether I put 1 hour or 150 hours into a paper the grade would be the same. 
S T A Y    A W A Y 
Workload:
Just the same as every other lit hum class
